Description:
As a vet I want week/month switch so that I plan leaves
AC: switch <400ms

As a vet I want to block slot so that my holiday is shown
AC: POST /agenda/block

As a vet I want to view animal history so that I prepare consult
AC: 3 past visits listed

As a user with disability I want keyboard/screen reader support so that I can use the app
AC: Lighthouse a11y ≥85, ARIA labels, focus order

As system I want schedule reminder J-7 so that client warned
AC: cron job saved
